div.p: Any involvement of the peritoneum should be recorded.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/nehta-crc-peritoneum-invasion defines the following codes:

tr.td: Tumour invades to the peritoneal surface
Tumour invades to the peritoneal surface
Tumour has formed nodule(s) discrete from the tumour mass along the serosal surface
Tumour has formed nodule(s) discrete from the tumour mass along the serosal surface

description.value: Any involvement of the peritoneum should be recorded.

definition.value: Tumour invades to the peritoneal surface

display.value: Tumour has formed nodule(s) discrete from the tumour mass along the serosal surface
